Construction 7

Forge of the Ancients
Ritual
E5
spell id [id]: 862
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 20
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 80E
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Forge of the Ancients
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The ancient forge of the Great One's servants is reconstructed. The magic of the forge will reduce the need for magic essence when forging magic items. It also enables mages to create more powerful items.
All magic items forged have their gem cost reduced by 20%. All mages crafts items as if they had the ability Master smith +1.
